page.shortlink: dt email Creating an ORDER BY Clause
page.description: When viewing the Specify DataSource dialog:

step.description: Click the Order By button to display the ORDER Clause dialog. An ORDER BY clause sequences the records returned by your SQL SELECT statement.
Select a column from the *[ui:Sort by]* list and Ascending or Descending.
Optionally, select another column from the *[ui:then by]* list Ascending or Descending.
Optionally, select another column from the *[ui:and then by]* list Ascending or Descending.
Click OK to save your selections and return to the Specify DataSource dialog.
